item.title: Detailed Hash Function
item.description: Hash Function There will be three topics related to HASH FUNCTION in this article. Generally, Hash Function could be divided into two part, Block cipher construct and dedicated hash function. Our focus is on dedicated function, which contains three aspects. 1. MD4 Family 1. MD5 2. SHA-1 3. SHA-3 2. SHA-3 3. Others
